    • pixelRays

      private List<Ray> pixelRays(Camera camera, int nX, int nY)
      Generates a list of rays corresponding to pixels in the camera's view.
      Parameters:
      camera - the Camera object representing the viewing perspective
      nX - the number of pixels in the horizontal direction
      nY - the number of pixels in the vertical direction
      Returns:
      a list of Ray objects representing the rays corresponding to each pixel

    • countIntersections

      private int countIntersections(List<Ray> rays, Intersectable shape)
      Counts the total number of intersections between a list of rays and an Intersectable shape.
      Parameters:
      rays - the list of Ray objects to be tested for intersections
      shape - the Intersectable shape to check for intersections with
      Returns:
      the total number of intersections between the rays and the shape
